Package model

Interface UserFlex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    User
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlexMockModel, UserFlexImpl
    public interface UserFlex
extends User
    Interface for all the new functions required for flexible portfolio.

              throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        name - name of portfolio
        stocksMap - map of {tickerSymbol , map of {date, quantity, commFee}}
        Returns:
        true if added , false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the date is not valid.
